i1.name: Illumination
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Lux's''' damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]] mark enemies with light energy for 6 seconds.
'''Lux's''' [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Final Spark|Lux}} consume the mark to deal {{as|{{pp|20 to 190}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

Starting an {{tip|attack windup}} against a target with a mark that is about to expire refreshes its duration to {{fd|0.25}} seconds. Casting {{ai|Final Spark|Lux}} refreshes the marks of all marked enemies to {{fd|1.25}} seconds if they are within {{tt|5000|Estimated}} units of the ability's casting position and have a mark with a remaining duration of less than 1 second.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Lux's damaging Champion ability mark enemies with light energy for 6 seconds.
Lux's basic attacks and Lux's Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 âˆ’ 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.
Starting an attack windup against a target with a mark that is about to expire refreshes its duration to 0.25 seconds. Casting Lux's Final Spark refreshes the marks of all marked enemies to 1.25 seconds if they are within 5000 units of the ability's casting position and have a mark with a remaining duration of less than 1 second.
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents {{ai|Final Spark|Lux}} from igniting ''Illumination''.
** The on-hit damage from ''Illumination'' via basic attack cannot be blocked by ''spell shield''.
* ''Illumination's'' trigger from a basic attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (bonus damage is negated and the mark will still be consumed).
* {{Pending for test}}: Parry interactions ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Light_Binding
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' releases a sphere of light in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first two enemies hit and {{tip|root|roots}} them for 2 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Lux releases a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and roots them for 2 seconds.
q1.notes:
* Targets immune to the {{tip|root}} still count towards ''Light Binding's'' two-target limit.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

w1.name: Prismatic_Barrier
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' launches her wand in the target direction which returns to her after reaching maximum range.

The wand grants a {{tip|shield}} to all allied {{tip|champions}} it passes through for {{fd|2.5}} seconds while it is outgoing and returning. '''Lux''' also receives the shield upon releasing the wand and upon its return. The shield can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lux launches her wand in the target direction which returns to her after reaching maximum range.
The wand grants a shield to all allied champions it passes through for 2.5 seconds while it is outgoing and returning. Lux also receives the shield upon releasing the wand and upon its return. The shield can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.
leveling: {{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|45 to 125}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|45*2 to 125*2}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Each pass of the wand grants a shield to each target once.
* ''Prismatic Barrier'' may only stack up to 2 times. Subsequent instances of passing through the wand have no effect on the shield's strength nor duration.
* The shield will also be granted to allies near the wand's return location.
* Both passes of ''Prismatic Barrier'' cannot hit units whose {{tip|center range|center}} is beyond the missile range or behind its origin, even if their {{tip|edge range|hitbox radius}} overlaps.
** At the return location, this behaviour is overridden by an additional center check with the same diameter as the missile width.
* If '''Lux''' {{tip|death|dies}} before her wand returns it will fizzle upon reaching maximum range.
* '''Lux's''' wand decelerates on the way out and accelerates on the way back.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* ''Prismatic Barrier'' is destroyed by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} but not {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

e1.name: Lucent_Singularity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target location for up to 5 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies within. ''Lucent Singularity'' can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Lux''' detonates the anomaly, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within. If ''Lucent Singularity'' was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.
''The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by Lucent Singularity's detonation are also slowed by the same amount for 1 second.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lux sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target location for up to 5 seconds, granting sight of the area and slowing enemies within. Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
Recast: Lux detonates the anomaly, dealing magic damage to all enemies within. If Lucent Singularity was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.
The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by Lucent Singularity's detonation are also slowed by the same amount for 1 second.
e1.notes:
*The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually does not.
* ''Lucent Singularity'' grants {{tip|sight}} while also in flight.

r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Lux fires a massive laser of light in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to all enemies hit and briefly reveals them as well as grants sight of the surrounding area.
